course_outcomes: Equip with knowledge of English as a world language and help them identify, write, and communicate in a grammatically correct manner.

subjects.prerequisites: Knowledge of ordinary and partial differential equations and their solutions.

Understand sequence and series concepts, tests of convergence, Taylor and power series, and apply them to problems.
Apply partial differentiation and multiple integration to evaluate engineering problems.
Understand matrices, determinants, inverse, and solve linear systems using Gauss Elimination.
Apply vector space concepts, rank-nullity, linear maps, eigenvalues & eigenvectors to solve mathematical problems.
Describe and apply network theorems to analyze DC and AC circuits.
Explain and analyze the construction and operation of transformers and electrical machines.
Understand and interpret semiconductor physics.
Understand and compare characteristics and applications of various diodes and transistors.
